Build-in-public devlog. Every commit tells a story.

2025-10-18

The Grid v1.0 — Initial Launch

Launched The Grid: interactive node visualization with neon cyberpunk aesthetics. Featured 10 initial nodes across Core, Ops, Creator, Life, Play, and Meta sectors.

launchgridcore
2025-10-17

Signal System Implementation

Implemented the Signal state system for tracking node lifecycle: Seed → Awake → Wiring → Live → Echo → Archive. Each state has distinct visual characteristics.

featurevisualization
2025-10-16

Brand System Finalized

Locked in the cyberpunk realism color palette: Aurum Gold, Electric Blue, Violet Core against Deep Space. Zero-bloat typography with Space Grotesk, Inter, and JetBrains Mono.

branddesign
